articles.description: NBA fans have seen little of newly acquired Los Angeles Clippers guard John Wall in recent seasons due to injuries and a lengthy team holdout.The former All-Star recently opened up about his mental health struggles while dealing with on- and off-court issues …
articles.content:

articles.author: Brian Lewis
articles.title: Nets moving closer to signing Markieff Morris - New York Post
articles.description: The Nets have been looking for a backup big man, and the 6-foot-9, 245-pounder would fit the bill.
articles.content:
The Nets are reportedly on the verge of handing out their final standard contract, with rapidly advancing mutual interest between Brooklyn and Markieff Morris.
